tool_description: UFC fighter and event data between 1993-2023 (updated regularly)
name: UFC Data
title: UFC Data

api_list.name: Filter
api_list.description: Allows users to filter by things such as winMethod, Fighter names and weightClass

api_list.name: Find Events By Fighter Name
api_list.description: Find all the events of a particular fighter

api_list.name: Find Events By Date Range
api_list.description: Find all the events that occured between two dates (MM/DD/YY) format

api_list.name: Find Matchups
api_list.description: Find all the events between two specific fighters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-data1.p.rapidapi.com/Events/FindMatchups/Jon Jones/Daniel Cormier"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-data1.p.rapidapi.com/Events/FindMatchups/{fighter1}/{fighter2}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find Fighter Stats
api_list.description: Takes in a fighters name and returns their career statistics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-data1.p.rapidapi.com/Fighters/FindStatsByFighterName/Jon Jones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://ufc-data1.p.rapidapi.com/Fighters/FindStatsByFighterName/{fightername}"
